attributes.review: disgusting app. as soon as i opened the app i saw bunker boy on my screen and i was absolutely horrified. his disgusting face stared menacingly into my soul. it triggered flashbacks of this donald trump x hitler image i saw in google. this also has traumatized my mom and dad, as i showed it this app to them and now theyre blind. do not get this app. it will leave mental and emotional scars on you. 😭😭😰
attributes.title: worst app to exist on the appstore
